selections.name: Cinque Stelle
selections.reason: Impressive debut winner at this track/distance. Rates highly (72) and retains William Pike. Looks the one to beat.

selections.name: Kings Court
selections.reason: Resuming. Showed ability in higher grade as a 2yo. Won recent trial and drawn the inside.

selections.name: Earl It Is
selections.reason: Consistent performer. Placed last start and fits well in this small field.

selections.name: Sansanee
selections.reason: Resuming after a long break. Trials were fair, place chance on best form.

danger_horse.name: Kings Court
danger_horse.reason: Class runner resuming with a trial win.

selections.name: Win For Buster
selections.reason: Resuming. Produced a high rating (75) last preparation which dominates this field. Pike rides.

selections.name: Oscars No Grouch
selections.reason: Solid 2nd last start behind the talented Cinque Stelle. That form line reads very well here.

selections.name: Can't Catch Me
selections.reason: Consistent maiden performer with back-to-back placings. Draws well.

selections.name: Ginger Ted
selections.reason: Has struggled recently but draws the rail in a weak field.

danger_horse.name: Oscars No Grouch
danger_horse.reason: Coming off a strong 2nd to a smart horse.

selections.name: Slip The Jab
selections.reason: Resuming for the Fernie/Parnham combination. Trial winner and showed promise last prep.

selections.name: Roaming America
selections.reason: Resuming with William Pike aboard. Won a recent trial and looks primed.

selections.name: Espresso Time
selections.reason: Rated 66 last prep. Has the speed to overcome the barrier.

selections.name: Nistirith
selections.reason: Consistent type who ran 2nd last start. Draws well.

danger_horse.name: Roaming America
danger_horse.reason: Pike booking and trial win suggest readiness.

selections.name: Savorski
selections.reason: Ran a strong 2nd last start with a high rating (73). Consistent stayer who looks well placed.

selections.name: Buster Biff
selections.reason: Spiked a huge rating (81) last start when narrowly beaten. If he repeats that, he wins.

selections.name: Eternal Romance
selections.reason: Consistent mare who ran 3rd in the same race as Savorski. Solid each-way hope.

selections.name: Declared Innocent
selections.reason: Winner two starts back. Failed last time but can bounce back from a good draw.

danger_horse.name: Buster Biff
danger_horse.reason: Last start rating was exceptional for this grade.

selections.name: Cheyne Bay
selections.reason: Consistent type rating 72 recently. 3rd last start and looks ready to peak.

selections.name: Zackariah Beau
selections.reason: Last start winner beating the top pick of Race 4. Form is strong, just needs to overcome the gate.

selections.name: Poppy's Roses
selections.reason: Lightweight chance with a solid rating (67) last start. Draws perfectly.

selections.name: Safari Boy
selections.reason: Last start winner at Mt Barker. This is harder but winning form is good form.

danger_horse.name: Zackariah Beau
danger_horse.reason: Beat a similar field last time out.
